languages.text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It is essential to detect and cure injuries that characters suffer in combat. It also increases the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored by medikits and allows the use of higher quality medikits. A high {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} value also assists in healing {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injuries{/g} before they would turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Этот навык зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g}.
Навык необходим для диагностирования и успешного лечения повреждений, которые персонаж получает в бою. Увеличивает количество {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} восстанавливаемого медкомплектами и позволяет использовать медкомплекты более высокого уровня. Высокое значение {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицины{/g} позволяет успешно исцелять {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}старые ранения{/g}, прежде чем они приведут к {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмам{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
This skill depends on Intelligence characteristic.
It is essential to detect and cure injuries that characters suffer in combat. It also increases the amount of wounds restored by medikits and allows to use medikits of better quality. A high Medicae value allows to heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injuries{/g} before they would turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.

languages.text:
Этот навык зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g}.
Навык необходим для диагностирования и успешного лечения повреждений, которые персонаж получает в бою. Увеличивает количество {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} восстанавливаемого медкомплектами и позволяет использовать медкомплекты более высокого уровня. Высокое значение {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицины{/g} позволяет успешно исцелять {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}старые ранения{/g}, прежде чем они приведут к {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмам{/g}.

Diese Fertigkeit wird durch die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaft{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} beeinflusst.
Sie ist unerlässlich, um Verletzungen, die Charaktere im Kampf erleiden, zu erkennen und zu heilen. Sie erhöht auch die Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, die durch Medikits versorgt werden können, und ermöglicht den Einsatz von Medikits höherer Qualität. Ein hoher {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-Wert hilft auch dabei, {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}alte Verletzungen{/g} zu heilen, bevor sie zu {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g} werden können.
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It is essential to detect and cure injuries that characters suffer in combat. It also increases the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored by medikits and allows the use of higher quality medikits. A high {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} value also assists in healing {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injuries{/g} before they would turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Diese Fertigkeit wird durch die Eigenschaft Intelligenz beeinflusst.
Sie ist unerlässlich, um Verletzungen, die Charaktere im Kampf erleiden, zu erkennen und zu heilen. Sie erhöht auch die Anzahl der Wunden, die durch Medikits versorgt werden können, und ermöglicht den Einsatz von Medikits höherer Qualität. Ein hoher Medicae-Wert hilft auch dabei, {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}alte Verletzungen{/g} zu heilen, bevor sie zu {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g} werden können.

languages.text:
Cette compétence repose sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
Elle est essentielle pour déceler et soigner les lésions que les personnages subissent au combat. Elle augmente également le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} restaurées par les médikits et permet d'utiliser des médikits de meilleure qualité. Une valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} élevée permet également de soigner des {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions anciennes{/g} avant qu'elles ne se transforment en {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatismes{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It is essential to detect and cure injuries that characters suffer in combat. It also increases the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored by medikits and allows the use of higher quality medikits. A high {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} value also assists in healing {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injuries{/g} before they would turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Cette compétence repose sur la caractéristique Intelligence.
Elle est essentielle pour déceler et soigner les lésions que les personnages subissent au combat. Elle augmente également le nombre de blessures restaurées par les médikits et permet d'utiliser des médikits de meilleure qualité. Une valeur de Medicae élevée permet également de soigner des {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions anciennes{/g} avant qu'elles ne se transforment en {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatismes{/g}.

languages.text:
此技能受{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}影响。
此技能可以用来治疗角色在战斗中承受的伤势。此技能还可以提高医疗包恢复的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}数量，允许角色使用更加高效的医疗包。如果角色的{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能够高，还可以治疗角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}旧伤{/g}，以免它们不断积累，形成{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It is essential to detect and cure injuries that characters suffer in combat. It also increases the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored by medikits and allows the use of higher quality medikits. A high {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} value also assists in healing {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injuries{/g} before they would turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
此技能受智力属性影响。
此技能可以用来治疗角色在战斗中承受的伤势。此技能还可以提高医疗包恢复的生命值数量，允许角色使用更加高效的医疗包。如果角色的医疗技能够高，还可以治疗角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}旧伤{/g}，以免它们不断积累，形成{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。

languages.original_text: This skill is vital for anyone who wishes to diagnose and mend {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} that characters suffer in combat. A high {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} score allows a character to treat old injuries before they lead to {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.

languages.text:
Esta habilidad se basa en la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} del personaje.
Es esencial para detectar y tratar las lesiones que los personajes sufren en combate. También aumenta las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} recuperadas por botiquines y permite el uso de botiquines de mayor calidad. Una puntuación alta de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} también ayuda a tratar {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones viejas{/g} antes de que se conviertan en {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It is essential to detect and cure injuries that characters suffer in combat. It also increases the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored by medikits and allows the use of higher quality medikits. A high {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} value also assists in healing {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injuries{/g} before they would turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} se basa en la característica de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} del personaje.
Es esencial para detectar y tratar las {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g} que los personajes sufren en combate. También aumenta las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} recuperadas por botiquines y permite el uso de botiquines de mayor calidad. Una puntuación alta de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} también ayuda a tratar lesiones viejas antes de que se conviertan en {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g}.{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}

languages.text:
このスキルは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}の影響を受ける。
キャラクターが戦闘中に負った負傷を見つけ治療することは重要だ。またメディキットによって回復されて{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が増加し、よりクオリティの高いメディキットの使用が可能になる。高い{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}の価値はまた、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}昔の負傷{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}になる前に治療を助ける。
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It is essential to detect and cure injuries that characters suffer in combat. It also increases the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored by medikits and allows the use of higher quality medikits. A high {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} value also assists in healing {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injuries{/g} before they would turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
このスキルは知性特性の影響を受ける。
キャラクターが戦闘中に負った負傷を見つけ治療することは重要だ。またメディキットによって回復されて体力が増加し、よりクオリティの高いメディキットの使用が可能になる。高いメディケアの価値はまた、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}昔の負傷{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}になる前に治療を助ける。

languages.text:
Bu yetenek, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliğine{/g} dayalıdır.
Karakterlerin çatışma esnasında maruz kaldıkları sakatlıkların tespiti ve tedavisi için gereklidir. Ayrıca sıhhiye çantasının tazelediği {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} miktarını artırır ve daha yüksek kalite sıhhiye çantalarının kullanımına olanak tanır. Yüksek {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Sıhhiye{/g} değeri aynı zamanda {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}eski sakatlıkların{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travmaya{/g} dönüşmeden önce iyileştirilebilmesini de sağlar.
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It is essential to detect and cure injuries that characters suffer in combat. It also increases the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored by medikits and allows the use of higher quality medikits. A high {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} value also assists in healing {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}old injuries{/g} before they would turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.
